info.title: Sansara MiniApp API
info.description: API for Sansara bath complex MiniApp

get.description: Get list of users with pagination

schema.title: Response Get Users Api V1 Users  Get
Response Get Programs Api V1 Programs  Get
Response Get Programs By Type Api V1 Programs Type  Program Type  Get
Response Get Events Api V1 Events  Get

get.description: Get list of bookings with optional filtering

schema.title: Response Get Bookings Api V1 Bookings  Get

delete.description: Delete booking by ID (soft delete by changing status to cancelled)

get.description: Get list of certificates with optional filtering

schema.title: Response Get Certificates Api V1 Certificates  Get
Response Get Promocodes Api V1 Certificates Promocodes  Get
Response Get Lottery Codes Api V1 Lottery Codes  Get

get.description: Get lottery code by code string

schema.title: Response Get Lottery Prizes Api V1 Lottery Prizes  Get

get.description: Get lottery prize by ticket number
Get list of lottery tickets with optional filtering

schema.title: Response Get Lottery Tickets Api V1 Lottery Tickets  Get

get.description: Get all lottery tickets for a user

schema.title: Response Get User Lottery Tickets Api V1 Lottery Tickets User  User Id  Get
Response Get All Site Content Api V1 Content Content Site Get
Response Get All Bot Settings Api V1 Content Settings Bot Get
Response Get All Mood Recommendations Api V1 Content Recommendations Mood Get

get.description: Get mood program recommendation by ID

put.description: Update mood program recommendation by ID

delete.description: Delete mood program recommendation by ID
